node.name: Emacsish
node.shortdescription:
A plugin that provides some Emacs like functionality. The functionality includes the ability to run external shell commands (Shell Selection) and create new external files (Save External). The ability to format paragraphs was added with version 0.8.0.

2010-05-12 - In spite of not being updated Emacish still works fine with Eclipse 3.5.*
node.body:
A plugin that provides some Emacs like functionality. The functionality includes the ability to run external shell commands (Shell Selection) and create new external files (Save External). The ability to format paragraphs was added with version 0.8.0.

2010-05-12 - In spite of not being updated Emacish still works fine with Eclipse 3.5.*
